name: Fight List Melee
description:
Challenge your friends in the new hot trivia game!

Find more words than your opponent to win the match. Use jokers to give you an edge and revelation wands to learn from your mistakes. Check your stats and make it to N°1 amongst your friends and worldwide!

● Play against real players online
● Check your progress, stats and ranking
● Use Jokers and revelation wands
● Chat with your friends
